ComicInfo.Title: 10 Second String Mortal Kombat II Fighters; Tried Hard with Violence; The Techno-Geek Geeks; When the Anti-Violence Trend Takes Over in Hollywood; Extremely Extreme Sports; Rapper Rap Sheets; The Second Time Around for Commercial Pitchmen; At the Opera; The Cracked Guide to Professional Jargon; Cracked Bell's New Phone Services; When History Gets the Disney Treatment; Moron Kombat; The Riddler Gets the Point!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Riddler romances a woman who wears exclamation points on her costume.
